channel.title: Need a little help with server lag
channel.description: My server is lagging really bad with only 25 people. Anyone got any tips??[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 05:48:48 PM[/size][hr]Anyone????

item.title: Need a little help with server lag
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBones BloodyBones
item.description:
@BloodyBones wrote:

Some servers have areas like a mod place… usually these are just packed with useless npc’s that lagg the server. Also like freescape, sometimes when npc’s talk to much your server will start to lagg from the chat flood.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help with server lag

item.title: Need a little help with server lag
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

What Bloody said is very true look for my tut on jailing massers… Also you might want to try deleting objects you added… Or get a new, better computer

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help with server lag

item.title: Need a little help with server lag
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBones BloodyBones
item.description:
@BloodyBones wrote:

Or, most of those people are massing. If you put your server on the server status that starts it all. Noobs look at the server status and… Noobs = massers ,massers = lagg, lagg = crash. Most people will tele far away and mass tele.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help with server lag

item.title: Need a little help with server lag
item.dc:creator: @Hyphy_Guy Hyphy Guy
item.description:
@Hyphy_Guy wrote:

Get a better computer or delete all un-needed files on you server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@buddy863 wrote:

well, if you are doing other things on your computer: that may cause the server to lag. duo processors can fix this problem
